query:
INSERT INTO userCoupons (userId, templateId, status, expireAt, createdAt, updatedAt)
SELECT 2, id, 'unused', DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL validDays DAY), NOW(), NOW()
FROM couponTemplates
WHERE isActive = 1
ORDER BY id
LIMIT 3;
